title: Could Covington Court Apartments Be Your New Home?
map_address: 364 E. Marie Ave near Oakdale Ave
posting_body: ['At Covington Court Apartments we have so many lovable amenities and we offer 4 different floor plans for our units!', 'We have a playground, a community garden, several outdoor grills available for everyone to use, an outdoor pool, secured entry with your own personal code at every door on all of the buildings, soda vending machines in the entry of every building, free off street parking and laundry rooms on the first floor of every building that you can pay for with your own credit card.', 'Not to mention we also pay for heat, hot water, lawn care, garbage and snow removal.', "The only utility you're responsible for is electricity.", 'Covington Court Apartments is a part of a tax credit program so we have to determine that you are under a certain income depending on the size of your household to get approved to live here.', 'Professionally managed by Goldmark Property Management.', 'Check us out at <URL>', 'To get you approved we do:', '- A criminal background check', '- An income check to make sure that your income is 2.5 times the monthly rent', '- A credit check(your credit must be satisfactory)', '- A rental history check', 'In order to apply you need two separate checks or money orders.', 'One would be the application fee which is $40 per adult.', 'The other one would be a $200 holding fee.', 'After you are approved you will pay the security deposit equal to 1 months rent and the $200 holding fee goes toward your 1st months rent.', 'If all of this sounds good to you and you want to make Covington your new home or have questions about availability, please feel free to give us a call or send us an email.', 'Thank you for considering Covington Court Apartments to be your new home!']
